unides: UNSW Sydney is Australia’s best university for career outcomes and second overall according to a new ranking published by The Australian Financial Review (AFR) today. UNSW ranked first for ‘career outcomes’, second for ‘research’ and for ‘global reputation’ and second university overall in Australia.

UNSW Sydney has moved up 26 spots in the 2024 QS World University Rankings to equal 19th alongside its crosstown counterpart the University of Sydney. The two universities are now ranked equal second in Australia. The city of Sydney now boasts 10 per cent of the top 20 universities in the world, affirming the city’s reputation as a great global city for higher education. Of 38 Australian universities ranked, three (15 per cent) are in the global top 20, an extraordinary achievement for a nation of only 0.3 per cent of the world’s population.
新南威尔士大学（ UNSW Sydney ）被认为是澳大利亚就业前景最好的大学，根据今天《澳大利亚金融评论》（AFR）发布的新排名，它在整体排名中位居第二。UNSW在‘职业前景’方面排名第一，研究和‘全球声誉’方面排名第二，也是澳大利亚整体排名第二的大学。
新南威尔士大学（ UNSW Sydney ）在2024年QS世界大学排名中上升了26位，与悉尼大学并列第19位。这两所大学现在在澳大利亚排名第二。悉尼市现在拥有全球前20所大学中的10%，证实了该城市作为高等教育的卓越全球城市的声誉。在排名的38所澳大利亚大学中，有三所（15%）进入了全球前20名，对于一个仅占世界人口0.3%的国家来说，这是一项非凡的成就。
majordes: Artificial intelligence (AI) is the intelligence of machines or software, as opposed to the intelligence of humans or animals. It is a field of study in computer science that develops and studies intelligent machines. Such machines may be called AIs.

AI technology is widely used throughout industry, government, and science. Some high-profile applications are: advanced web search engines (e.g., Google Search), recommendation systems (used by YouTube, Amazon, and Netflix), understanding human speech (such as Google Assistant, Siri, and Alexa), self-driving cars (e.g., Waymo), generative and creative tools (ChatGPT and AI art), and superhuman play and analysis in strategy games (such as chess and Go).
人工智能（AI）是指机器或软件的智能，与人类或动物的智能相对。它是计算机科学中研发和研究智能机器的研究领域。这样的机器可以被称为人工智能。
人工智能技术在工业、政府和科学中被广泛应用。一些知名的应用包括：先进的网络搜索引擎（例如Google搜索）、推荐系统（用于YouTube、Amazon和Netflix）、理解人类语音（如Google助手、Siri和Alexa）、自动驾驶汽车（例如Waymo）、生成和创造性工具（ChatGPT和AI艺术）以及在战略游戏中进行超人类游戏和分析（例如国际象棋和围棋）。
description: This degree encompasses a broad spectrum of the AI field, covers advanced topics such as Machine Learning & Data Mining, Neural Networks, Deep Learning, Recommender Systems, and Natural Language Processing. This comprehensive curriculum provides candidates with a rich and thorough understanding of AI, strengthening his professional depth.
该经历涵盖了人工智能领域的内容，包括机器学习与数据挖掘、神经网络、深度学习、推荐系统以及自然语言处理等先进主题。这个全面的课程设置为学生提供了对人工智能的深入而全面的理解，增强了他们在专业领域的深度。

courses.CourseName: Solving Modern Programming Problems with Rust

unides: UNSW Sydney is Australia’s best university for career outcomes and second overall according to a new ranking published by The Australian Financial Review (AFR) today. UNSW ranked first for ‘career outcomes’, second for ‘research’ and for ‘global reputation’ and second university overall in Australia.

UNSW Sydney has moved up 26 spots in the 2024 QS World University Rankings to equal 19th alongside its crosstown counterpart the University of Sydney. The two universities are now ranked equal second in Australia. The city of Sydney now boasts 10 per cent of the top 20 universities in the world, affirming the city’s reputation as a great global city for higher education. Of 38 Australian universities ranked, three (15 per cent) are in the global top 20, an extraordinary achievement for a nation of only 0.3 per cent of the world’s population.
新南威尔士大学（ UNSW Sydney ）被认为是澳大利亚就业前景最好的大学，根据今天《澳大利亚金融评论》（AFR）发布的新排名，它在整体排名中位居第二。UNSW在‘职业前景’方面排名第一，研究和‘全球声誉’方面排名第二，也是澳大利亚整体排名第二的大学。
新南威尔士大学（ UNSW Sydney ）在2024年QS世界大学排名中上升了26位，与悉尼大学并列第19位。这两所大学现在在澳大利亚排名第二。悉尼市现在拥有全球前20所大学中的10%，证实了该城市作为高等教育的卓越全球城市的声誉。在排名的38所澳大利亚大学中，有三所（15%）进入了全球前20名，对于一个仅占世界人口0.3%的国家来说，这是一项非凡的成就。
majordes: Data science is an interdisciplinary academic field that uses statistics, scientific computing, scientific methods, processes, algorithms and systems to extract or extrapolate knowledge and insights from potentially noisy, structured, or unstructured data.

Data science also integrates domain knowledge from the underlying application domain (e.g., natural sciences, information technology, and medicine). Data science is multifaceted and can be described as a science, a research paradigm, a research method, a discipline, a workflow, and a profession.
数据科学是一个跨学科的学术领域，利用统计学、科学计算、科学方法、过程、算法和系统，从可能带有噪声、结构化或非结构化数据中提取或推演知识和见解。
数据科学还整合了来自基础应用领域的领域知识（例如自然科学、信息技术和医学）。数据科学是多层面的，可以描述为一门科学、一个研究范式、一种研究方法、一门学科、一个工作流程和一个职业。
description: This stream covers a wide range of data-related fields, covers Machine Learning & Data Mining, Database Systems Implementation, Recommender Systems, and Design & Analysis of Algorithms. This comprehensive curriculum provides candidates with a rich and thorough understanding of data, strengthening his professional depth.
该经历涵盖了广泛的与数据相关的内容，包括机器学习与数据挖掘、数据库系统实现、推荐系统以及算法的设计与分析。这个全面的课程体系为学生提供了对数据的丰富和深入的理解，增强了他们的专业深度。

courses.CourseName: Solving Modern Programming Problems with Rust

unides: Southwest University of Science and Technology is located in Mianyang City, Sichuan Province, a science and technology city in China. The school is a university jointly built by the People's Government of Sichuan Province and the Ministry of Education. It is a university jointly built by the People's Government of Sichuan Province and the State Administration of Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense. It has been identified by the Ministry of Education as one of the 14 universities in the western region that are under national key construction. Comrade Li Lanqing, former member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council, praised the school's 'co-construction and regional industry-university-research joint education' for having developed a school-running path with its own characteristics. The current party secretary of the school is Dong Faqin and the principal Huang Qi.

The school currently has more than 39,000 students. It has 16 colleges including the National Defense Science and Technology Institute, with 85 undergraduate majors in 9 major disciplines including engineering, agriculture, science, economics, law, literature, management, education, and art; it has first-level doctorate degrees There are 5 authorization points, 18 doctoral degree authorization points in second-level disciplines; 24 master's degree authorization points in first-level disciplines, 88 master's degree authorization points in second-level disciplines; and 15 professional master's degree categories. There are 3 postdoctoral research stations, and doctoral students are jointly trained in 4 disciplines with the China Academy of Engineering Physics. There are 2 'double first-class' construction disciplines (groups) in Sichuan Province, 4 provincial-level advantageous disciplines, 11 provincial-level key disciplines, 1 basic national defense discipline approved by the Bureau of National Defense Science and Industry, and 5 national defense specialty disciplines. Four disciplines, materials science, engineering science, chemistry, and environment/ecology, have entered the top 1% of ESI rankings, among which three disciplines of materials science, engineering science, and chemistry have entered the top 5‰ of ESI rankings.
西南科技大学位于中国四川省绵阳市，这是中国的一个科技城市。该校是由四川省人民政府和教育部共建的大学，也是由四川省人民政府和国防科技工业局共建的大学。教育部已将其确定为西部地区14所国家重点建设的大学之一。中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理李岚清同志对学校的'共建和区域产学研联合育人'赞誉有加，认为学校发展出了一条具有自身特色的办学道路。学校现任党委书记是董发勤，校长是黄琦。

学校目前有超过3.9万名学生。学校设有16个学院，包括国防科技学院，在工程、农业、科学、经济、法学、文学、管理、教育和艺术等9个主要学科领域设有85个本科专业；设有5个一级博士学位授予权点，在二级学科中设有18个博士学位授权点；在一级学科中设有24个硕士学位授权点，在二级学科中设有88个硕士学位授权点；设有15个专业硕士类别。学校设有3个博士后科研流动站，与中国工程物理研究院共同培养博士生的学科有4个。学校在四川省拥有2个'双一流'建设学科（群），拥有4个省级优势特色学科，拥有11个省级重点学科，拥有国防科技工业局批准的1个基础国防学科，拥有5个国防专业学科。材料科学、工程科学、化学和环境/生态学等四个学科进入了ESI排名的前1%，其中材料科学、工程科学和化学等三个学科进入了ESI排名的前5‰。
majordes: Functional materials are generally characterised as those materials which possess particular native properties and functions of their own. For example, ferroelectricity, piezoelectricity, magnetism or energy storage functions.

Functional materials are found in all classes of materials: ceramics, metals, polymers and organic molecules. Functional materials are often used in electromagnetic applications from KHz to THz and at optical frequencies where the plasmonic properties of metals assume particular importance. Functional materials are also of critical importance in materials for energy such as electro- and magnetocaloric materials, for energy storage and for solar harvesting functions.
功能材料通常被定义为那些具有特定固有属性和功能的材料。例如，铁电性、压电性、磁性或能量存储功能。
功能材料存在于所有类别的材料中：陶瓷、金属、聚合物和有机分子。功能材料通常用于电磁应用，从千赫兹到太赫兹，以及在光学频率，金属的等离子体性质尤为重要。功能材料在能源材料中也至关重要，如电磁和磁热材料，能量存储和太阳能收集功能。
description: This degree encompasses a broad spectrum of chemistry, including inorganic chemistry, organic chemistry, and physical chemistry, along with the fundamentals of material science. Additionally, it covers mechanical design, electronic technology, and engineering mechanics, providing candidates with a comprehensive and rich engineering background.
该经历涵盖了广泛的化学范围，包括无机化学、有机化学和物理化学，以及材料科学的基础知识。此外，它涵盖了机械设计、电子技术和工程力学，为候选人提供了全面而丰富的工程背景。

courses.CourseName: Course Design of Fundamentals of Mechanical Design
Modern Analysis and Testing Technology Experiment
机械设计基础课程设计
现代分析与测试技术实验
功能材料毕业设计（论文）

It is a university jointly built by the People's Government of Sichuan Province and the State Administration of Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense. It has been identified by the Ministry of Education as one of the 14 universities in the western region that are under national key construction. 学校目前有超过3.9万名学生。学校设有16个学院，包括国防科技学院，在工程、农业、科学、经济、法学、文学、管理、教育和艺术等9个主要学科领域设有85个本科专业；设有5个一级博士学位授予权点，在二级学科中设有18个博士学位授权点；在一级学科中设有24个硕士学位授权点，在二级学科中设有88个硕士学位授权点；设有15个专业硕士类别。学校设有3个博士后科研流动站，与中国工程物理研究院共同培养博士生的学科有4个。学校在四川省拥有2个'双一流'建设学科（群），拥有4个省级优势特色学科，拥有11个省级重点学科，拥有国防科技工业局批准的1个基础国防学科，拥有5个国防专业学科。材料科学、工程科学、化学和环境/生态学等四个学科进入了ESI排名的前1%，其中材料科学、工程科学和化学等三个学科进入了ESI排名的前5‰。
majordes: Business administration, also known as business management, is the administration of a commercial enterprise.

It includes all aspects of overseeing and supervising the business operations of an organization. From the point of view of management and leadership, it also covers fields that include office building administration, accounting, finance, designing, development, quality assurance, data analysis, sales, project management, information-technology management, research and development, marketing and communication studies.The administration of a business includes the performance or management of business operations and decision-making, as well as the efficient organization of people and other resources to direct activities towards common goals and objectives. In general, administration refers to the broader management function, including the associated finance, personnel and MIS services.
工商管理，也称为企业管理，是对商业企业的管理。它涵盖了监督和管理组织商业运营的所有方面。
从管理和领导的角度来看，它还涵盖了包括办公楼管理、会计、财务、设计、开发、质量保证、数据分析、销售、项目管理、信息技术管理、研究与开发、市场营销和传播研究等领域。工商管理包括业务运营和决策的执行，以及有效组织人力和其他资源，引导活动朝着共同的目标和目标方向发展。总的来说，管理涵盖了更广泛的管理职能，包括相关的财务、人事和管理信息服务。
description: This degree encompasses fields such as economics, management, and accounting, including core courses in marketing, project management, human resource management, and financial management. Through the pursuit of this degree, candidates acquire a keen business mindset and systematic enterprise management capabilities.
该经历涵盖了经济学、管理学和会计学等领域，包括营销、项目管理、人力资源管理和财务管理等核心课程。通过攻读这个学位，学生将获得敏锐的商业思维和系统的企业管理能力。

courses.CourseName: 工商管理专业毕业设计（论文）

WhyMe.description:
The candidate possesses outstanding learning ability.
1. Excellent self-driven learning. The candidate maintains a mindset of constantly learning new things, self-learning piano and guitar out of passion, and systematically studying photography, Photoshop editing, Adobe Illustrator vector graphics design, Lightroom color correction, Premiere, and Final Cut Pro video editing software in spare time. The candidate always learns new technologies and methods with a results-oriented approach for achieving perfection.
2. Exceptional learning speed. The candidate completed 90% of the coursework for a second degree within one year of their third year of undergraduate study, which should have taken four years. Additionally, the candidate studied four majors and holds three degrees, accomplishing the learning of four majors in the time usually taken for two.
3. Excellent learning methods. Thanks to AI empowerment, the candidate adeptly uses ChatGPT and other AI tools to quickly grasp fresh technologies and efficiently solve problems. The candidate consistently embraces new technologies and methods rapidly.

The candidate demonstrates outstanding leadership.
1. Diverse leadership roles. The candidate held key positions in the university's study department, technology and entrepreneurship guidance station, and debate team. Additionally, they served as class president, study committee member, and life committee member, leading the class to stand out in various competitions, winning all awards and honors with top-ranking results.
2. Rich experience as a competition leader. As a manager, the candidate led over 100 competitions, achieving numerous first prizes at the provincial and district levels, totaling over 58 awards.
3. The candidate led a team in entrepreneurship, expanding business in a new area, involving crucial tasks such as leasing company space, purchasing corporate supplies, recruiting personnel, planning marketing activities, and managing finances.

The candidate possesses excellent communication skills.
1. Proficient speaker and communicator. The candidate participated in over 100 competitions, delivering over 50 public speeches as a representative. They are a star presenter for NUSTP, explaining to over 400 visitors. Furthermore, the candidate served in the debate team, winning debate championships, and earning the title of the best debater. The candidate negotiated a 50% discount on materials during the procurement process for the company and secured advertising sponsorship for club activities.
2. Strong empathy. The candidate, having studied organizational management and organizational psychology, easily perceives others' emotions and feelings, swiftly establishing emotional connections for efficient and logical communication.

The candidate has strong problem-solving ability.
1. Proficient use of management principles to analyze problems, such as SWOT analysis, Porter's Five Forces model, and the Boston Matrix. The candidate quickly analyzes problems using these tools, identifies key solutions, and proficiently visualizes them.
2. Clear logic and divergent thinking. The candidate, having systematically studied strategic management, management principles, project management, and operations research, adeptly uses management tools and mathematical methods to solve problems, improving task flow and optimizing work efficiency.

The candidate possesses an outstanding aesthetic attitude.
1. The candidate studied fine arts from an early age, having advanced aesthetic sense. They believe that excellent projects and products require exceptional packaging and marketing. The candidate independently designed brand logos for multiple companies and assisted in their registration.
2. The candidate is committed to aesthetic pursuits, rejecting disorganized formats, irregular layouts, and failed color schemes in deliverables. They have high standards for all documents, projects, and works.
3. The candidate has sufficient delivery capability for aesthetics. They can independently design and create vector and pixel graphics, proficient in software such as Photoshop, Illustrator, Pages, DI, LR, PPT, KeyNote. The candidate has a profound understanding of layout, color matching, and can independently deliver conference-level slides, high-quality posters, brochures, and company logos. They have won awards in multiple design competitions and were a designated poster design member for the university's science and technology entrepreneurship guidance station.

The candidate possesses good emotional energy, stability, and firmness.
The candidate has a high level of emotional awareness, familiarity with micro-expressions and organizational psychology. They can effectively manage upwards and downwards, demonstrating excellent communication in resolving customer complaints and unexpected situations. The candidate remains optimistic, resilient, quickly handling negative emotions at work. They consistently maintain a positive and energetic attitude, bringing joy and positive feedback to those around them, always providing emotional support.

候选人拥有出色的学习能力。
1.优秀的学习自驱力。候选人时刻保持学习新事物的心态。仅凭爱好自学了钢琴和吉他，利用业余时间，还系统的学习了摄影、Ps修图、Adobe Ai矢量图形设计、Lr调色、Pr以及Final cut pro等视频剪辑软件。候选人总会以结果为导向学习新技术、新方法，以达到更完美的实现结果。
2.优秀的学习速度。候选人在本科大三一年的时间内完成了第二学位本该4年完成的90%的课程。同时，候选人学习过四个专业，持有三个学位。候选人4个专业只消耗了2个专业的学习时间. 
3.优秀的学习方法。得益于AI赋能，候选人善于利用ChatGPT等AI快速掌握新鲜技术，更高效的解决方法。候选人总能快速拥抱新技术，快速拥抱新方法。

候选人具有卓越的领导力。
1.多元的领导角色。候选人曾在大学学习部、科技和创业指导站、辩论队担任关键角色。并在班级担任过班长、学习委员和生活委员等职位。带领班级在各级评优中脱颖而出，不仅赢得所有的奖项和荣誉，且均是第一名的成绩。
2.丰富的竞赛领导者经历。候选人作为管理者领导了超过100次比赛，获得多个省赛一等奖，市区一等奖等，总计58项奖项。
3.候选人曾经带领团队创业，候选人带领一个团队到一个新地区扩展业务。涉及租赁公司场地，购置企业物资，招聘企业人员，策划营销活动，计划和管理财务等关键任务。

候选人拥有良好的沟通能力。
1.候选人一位熟练的演讲者及表达者，候选人曾参与了100多场比赛并作为代表人发表了50多次公开演讲。是NUSTP的明星讲解员，讲解过超过400人的参观。同时，候选人曾就职于辩论队，所在队伍获得辩论赛冠军，候选人并获得最佳辩手称号。候选人曾在采购过程为公司谈判获得50%的物资折扣，并为俱乐部活动谈判过广告赞助。
2.候选人具有强大的共情能力。同时候选人学习过组织管理学，组织心理学。候选人能轻松感知他人情绪和感受，并快速建立情感连接，从而做到快速高效地科学沟通。沟通做到有情有理有逻辑。

候选人具有强大的解题能力。
1.候选人熟练使用管理学原理分析问题，例如SWOT分析，波特五力模型，波士顿矩阵等。候选人可以借助这些工具快速的分析问题，找到解决问题的关键。并熟练将其可视化分享。
2.候选人具有清晰的逻辑和发散性思维，懂得合理地运用有效的多种框架来分析和解决复杂问题。候选人曾系统学习过战略管理，管理学原理，项目管理，运筹学等课程。能熟练使用管理学工具和数学方法来解决问题，改善任务流畅，优化工作效率。

候选人具有具有优秀的审美态度。
1.候选人从小学习美术，拥有高级的审美。候选人相信任何良好的项目和产品都离不开优秀的包装和营销。候选人曾为多个企业独立设计品牌logo，并帮助完成注册。
2.候选人对美学有执着追求。候选人不能接受格式混乱，排版不规范，配色失败的交付方式。对所有交付的文件、项目、作品都有较高的要求。
3.候选人对美学有足够的交付能力。候选人可独立自主设计和制作矢量图、像素图。候选人熟悉PS、AI、Pages、DI、LR、PPT、KeyNote等软件。候选人对排版、配色、版面都有深刻的理解。可独立交付发布会级幻灯片、高级海报、宣传册、企业logo。候选人曾在多个设计竞赛中获得奖。曾经是大学生科技创业指导站的御用海报设计成员之一。设计作品获2个一等奖、2个二等奖和2个三等奖。

候选人具有良好的情绪能量，稳定而坚定。
候选人具有高度情绪感知能力、熟悉微表情和组织心理学。能合理向上向下管理，在解决客户投诉和突发情况的沟通方面表现出色。候选人乐观且抗压，能够快速处理工作中的负面情绪。始终保持积极向上的态度和充满活力。能为身边的人带来快乐和正面反馈，时刻为身边人提供正向的情感支持。

description: Hello, I am {bold}Scott{bold}, I have {bold}2 years{bold} of web development experience and {bold}3 years{bold} of UI/UX design experience and hold a Master’s degree in IT (AI) from {bold}UNSW{bold}. Additionally, I have {bold}dual Bachelor{bold}’s degrees in Management and Engineering. I am proficient in {bold}HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Redux, Node.js, Next.js, and Python (Django){bold}, with extensive skills in {bold}GitHub, Figma, UI/UX design, ZSH, CI/CD, AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda), Nginx, and Google Apigee{bold}. I believe I can bring significant value to your company.
What value can I bring to your company?
1. {bold}Technical Expertise{bold} – I can develop, optimize, and maintain your website. Whether it’s improving performance, fixing issues, or building a new website from scratch, I can handle it.

2. {bold}Aesthetic Value{bold} – I have a background in UI/UX design and have independently delivered design projects before. This allows me to pay attention to aesthetic details that many developers might overlook.

3. {bold}Business Impact{bold} – As a web developer, I don’t just focus on coding; I also care about your product and business goals. With my management background, I can analyze data to track user behavior and help you understand what content attracts users the most.
What is the status of my visa?
I hold {bold}sub-class 485{bold}. My visa will expire on {bold}11/10/2029{bold}, the same period as {bold}PR{bold}. I don’t need sponsorship.

你好，我是{bold}Scott{bold}，我有{bold}2年{bold}的Web开发经验和{bold}3年{bold}的UI/UX设计经验，并拥有{bold}UNSW{bold}的IT（人工智能）硕士学位。此外，我还拥有{bold}管理和工程{bold}双学士学位。我熟悉{bold}HTML、CSS、JavaScript、React、Redux、Node.js、Next.js和Python（Django）{bold}，并具备{bold}GitHub、Figma、UI/UX设计、ZSH、CI/CD、AWS（EC2、S3、Lambda）、Nginx和Google Apigee{bold}等方面的丰富技能。我相信我能为贵公司带来重要价值。
我能为贵公司带来哪些价值？
1. {bold}技术专长{bold} – 我可以开发、优化和维护您的网站。无论是提升性能、修复问题，还是从零开始构建新网站，我都能胜任。
2. {bold}美学价值{bold} – 我有UI/UX设计背景，并曾独立完成设计项目。这使我能关注许多开发者可能忽略的美学细节。
3. {bold}商业影响{bold} – 作为一名Web开发者，我不仅关注编码，还关心产品和业务目标。凭借我的管理背景，我可以分析数据，跟踪用户行为，并帮助您了解哪些内容最能吸引用户。
我的签证状态是什么？
我持有{bold}485子类签证{bold}。我的签证将于{bold}2029年10月11日{bold}到期，与{bold}PR{bold}的有效期相同。我不需要担保。
Smart and Hardworking, diverse academic background.
聪慧好学，拥有复合学术背景。
Demonstrating excellence, won 17 scholarships.
卓越出彩，赢得过17项奖学金。
Actively advancing, achieved over 58 honors.
积极奋进，获得过58项荣誉。
Actively advancing, achieved over 58 honors.
积极奋进，获得过58多项荣誉。
Actively advancing, achieved over 58 honors.
积极奋进，获得过58多项荣誉。
Actively advancing, achieved over 58 honors.
积极奋进，获得过58多项荣誉。

Mbti:
[The first letter: E (Extraversion) or I (Introversion)]  E, Extraversion, indicates an outgoing nature. Extraverts are skilled at interacting with others, and their energy comes from social interactions. I, Introversion, indicates an introverted nature. Introverts excel in independent thinking, and their energy comes from self-reflection. 
[The second letter: S (Sensing) or N (Intuition)] S, Sensing, represents sensing. Sensing individuals tend to focus on the specific details of the real world. N, Intuition, represents intuition. Intuitive individuals tend to focus on abstract concepts and future possibilities.
[The third letter: T (Thinking) or F (Feeling)] T, Thinking, represents logic. Thinking individuals make decisions primarily based on logic and analysis. F, Feeling, represents feeling. Feeling individuals make decisions primarily based on emotions and values. 
[The fourth letter: J (Judging) or P (Perceiving)] J, Judging, represents judging. Judging individuals prefer planning and organization, seeking clear goals and order. P, Perceiving, represents perceiving. Perceiving individuals prefer flexibility and openness, seeking possibilities and change.

[第一个字母：E（外倾）或I（内倾）] E，即Extraversion，表示外向。外向的人善于与他人互动，精力来自于与他人的交往。I，即Introversion，表示内向。内向的人善于独立思考，精力来自于自我反省。
[第二个字母：S（实感）或N（直觉）] S，即Sensing，表示实感。实感型人倾向于关注现实世界的具体细节。N，即iNtuition，表示直觉。直觉型人倾向于关注抽象概念和未来可能性。
[第三个字母：T（逻辑）或F（情感）] T，即Thinking，表示逻辑。逻辑型人在做决策时主要依据逻辑和分析。F，即Feeling，表示情感。情感型人在做决策时主要依据情感和价值观。
[第四个字母：J（判断）或P（知觉）] J，即Judging，表示判断。判断型人喜欢有计划和组织，追求目标明确和条理。P，即Perceiving，表示知觉。知觉型人喜欢灵活和开放，追求可能性和变化。

feature.name: Energy
feature.defi: Source of Energy: Refers to where an individual gains energy, either through solitude or interacting with others.
feature.des: Extraverted individuals enjoy group activities and value social interactions. They are often outwardly enthusiastic and expressive of their excitement.

feature.name: Mind
feature.defi: Thinking Style: Refers to whether people focus on details and facts or prioritize abstraction and possibilities when processing information.
feature.des: Visionary individuals are highly imaginative, open-minded, and curious. They value originality and focus on underlying meanings and distant possibilities.

feature.name: Natrue
feature.defi: Judgment Style: Refers to whether people rely on logical analysis or prioritize emotions and values when making decisions.
feature.des: Feeling individuals value emotional expression and sensitivity. They emphasize empathy, social harmony, and cooperation.

feature.name: Tactics
feature.defi: Coping Style: Refers to whether people prefer planning and control or flexibility and adaptability.
feature.des: Prospecting individuals excel at improvising and seizing opportunities. They are often highly flexible, avoid rigidity, and prioritize novelty over stability.

feature.name: Identity
feature.defi: Identity Trait: Refers to people's confidence in themselves and their goals, as well as their ability to handle stress.
feature.des: Assertive individuals are self-assured, calm, and resilient to stress. They avoid over-worrying and confidently pursue their goals.

feature.name: 能量来源
feature.defi: 能量来源：指的是个体从哪里获得能量，是通过独处还是与他人互动。
feature.des: 外向型的人很享受团体活动，重视社交互动。他们往往外表热情，会表达他们的兴奋。

feature.name: 思维方式
feature.defi: 思维方式：指的是人们在信息处理时倾向于关注细节与事实，还是重视抽象和可能性。
feature.des: 有远见型的人非常富有想象力、思想开放并充满好奇心。他们重视原创性，专注于隐含的意义和遥远的可能性。

feature.name: 判断方式
feature.defi: 判断方式：指的是人们在决策时依赖逻辑分析还是重视情感和价值观。
feature.des: 感受型的人重视情感表达和敏感性。他们非常重视同理心、社会和谐及合作。

feature.name: 应对方式
feature.defi: 应对方式：指的是人们是更倾向于计划和控制，还是更注重灵活和适应性。
feature.des: 展望型的人非常擅长即兴发挥和适应机会。他们通常非常灵活，不墨守成规，把新颖性看得高于稳定性。

feature.name: 身份特征
feature.defi: 身份特征：指的是人们对自我和目标的信心程度，以及应对压力的能力。
feature.des: 坚决型的人自信、性情平和，能抵抗压力。他们拒绝过度担心，在努力实现目标时往往会自信面对。

Frontend.description: As a Frontend Developer, I focus on creating functional, user-friendly, and visually appealing web applications. I combine a solid understanding of web technologies with a keen eye for design to build seamless user experiences. With experience in both frontend development and design collaboration, I aim to build scalable applications that perform efficiently while maintaining high standards of accessibility and SEO. I am committed to continuously improving my skills and keeping up with the latest trends in frontend development.

skills.name: HTML
skills.description: Experienced in HTML to create semantic, accessible web pages while ensuring best practices for SEO, including the use of ARIA roles and semantic tags.

skills.name: CSS
skills.description: Skilled in CSS for creating visually appealing and responsive web designs, utilizing techniques such as CSS Grid, Flexbox, and SASS preprocessors.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.description: Proficient in JavaScript to build interactive web applications, with expertise in ES6+ features and asynchronous programming techniques.

skills.name: TypeScript
skills.description: Experienced in TypeScript to enhance JavaScript with static typing, improving code quality and maintainability, including the use of advanced types and interfaces.

skills.name: React
skills.description: Proficient in React for building dynamic single-page applications (SPAs), with strong knowledge of hooks, context API, and React Router for client-side routing.

skills.name: Next.js
skills.description: Experienced in Next.js for building server-side rendered React applications, including dynamic routing, API routes, and deployment to platforms like Vercel.

skills.name: Redux
skills.description: Experienced in Redux for managing application state, including middleware such as Redux Thunk and Redux Saga for handling asynchronous actions.

skills.name: Tailwind CSS
skills.description: Skilled in Tailwind CSS for fast UI development, utilizing its utility-first design principles to create responsive and scalable web layouts.

skills.name: Framer Motion
skills.description: Experienced in using Framer Motion for building smooth, interactive animations in React applications, including transitions and gesture-based animations.

skills.name: RESTful APIs
skills.description: Experienced in working with RESTful APIs to enable efficient client-server communication, with an understanding of HTTP methods, status codes, and API documentation using tools like Swagger.

skills.name: GraphQL (learning)
skills.description: Currently learning GraphQL to optimize data fetching and API management, including experimenting with queries, mutations, and working with GraphQL servers.

skills.name: Jest
skills.description: Experienced in using Jest for unit and integration testing to ensure code quality, including working with mocking libraries and integrating tests into continuous integration workflows.

skills.name: Cypress (learning)
skills.description: Currently learning Cypress for end-to-end testing, focusing on writing test suites to verify application stability and improving user experience through automated tests.

skills.name: Webpack (learning)
skills.description: Learning Webpack for bundling JavaScript and optimizing web performance, with experience in using loaders, plugins, and optimizing build processes.

skills.name: Performance Optimization
skills.description: Proficient in web performance optimization, focusing on techniques to enhance loading times and user experience, using tools like Google Lighthouse and Chrome DevTools.

skills.name: Accessibility
skills.description: Skilled in implementing accessibility best practices, including ARIA roles, keyboard navigation, and screen reader testing to ensure web applications are inclusive.

skills.name: SEO Optimization
skills.description: Knowledgeable in SEO optimization, using tools like Google Chrome to improve website visibility by optimizing metadata, structure, and content for better indexing.

skills.name: Figma
skills.description: Proficient in Figma for creating UI/UX designs, collaborating with design teams, and translating design systems into responsive web components.

skills.name: Adobe Photoshop (PS)
skills.description: Experienced in using Adobe Photoshop to design and edit graphics, web elements, and optimize visuals for the web.

skills.name: Component Libraries
skills.description: Experienced with using component libraries like Flowbite UI, Material-UI, Ant Design, and Bootstrap for building responsive and scalable UI elements.

skills.name: Responsive Design
skills.description: Skilled in responsive design to ensure applications work across a wide range of devices, using techniques like media queries, flexible grids, and responsive images.

skills.name: Animation Libraries
skills.description: Experienced with animation libraries such as Framer Motion, Animation.css, and Spring for adding interactive animations while optimizing performance.

skills.name: Testing Library
skills.description: Experienced in using Testing Library for writing unit and integration tests, ensuring code reliability and automating testing workflows.

Frontend.description: 作为一名充满激情和创新精神的前端开发工程师，我专注于构建美观且富有互动性的用户界面，提供卓越的用户体验。凭借对设计和技术的深刻理解，我将复杂的想法转化为简洁、功能强大且视觉吸引人的应用程序。我的技术涵盖了广泛的领域，使我能够开发出既外观精美又性能流畅的现代化 web 应用。我致力于推动前端开发的边界，确保每个项目在视觉效果和功能性之间取得良好的平衡。

skills.name: HTML
skills.description: 熟练使用 HTML 创建结构清晰、语义化的网页内容，确保可访问性和 SEO 最佳实践，包括使用 ARIA 角色和语义标签。

skills.name: CSS
skills.description: 擅长使用 CSS 设计视觉吸引和响应式的网页，精通 CSS Grid、Flexbox、动画、过渡效果以及 SASS 等预处理器。

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.description: 具备使用 JavaScript 开发动态交互式 web 应用的经验，熟悉 ES6+ 特性、异步编程，并能够使用现代库和框架进行开发。

skills.name: TypeScript
skills.description: 熟练使用 TypeScript 为 JavaScript 添加静态类型，提升代码质量和可维护性，掌握高级类型、泛型和接口等概念。

skills.name: React
skills.description: 精通 React，用于构建高效和易于维护的单页应用（SPA），熟悉使用 hooks、context API 和 React Router 实现动态路由。

skills.name: Next.js
skills.description: 具备使用 Next.js 进行服务器端渲染和静态网站生成的经验，了解动态路由、API 路由以及在 Vercel 等平台的部署。

skills.name: Redux
skills.description: 熟练使用 Redux 进行复杂应用的状态管理，了解 Redux Thunk 和 Redux Saga 等中间件，处理异步操作。

skills.name: Tailwind CSS
skills.description: 精通 Tailwind CSS，通过功能优先的设计模式快速开发响应式用户界面，能够使用一致且可扩展的框架进行自定义设计。

skills.name: Framer Motion
skills.description: 熟练使用 Framer Motion 创建平滑且富有吸引力的动画，掌握关键帧、过渡和基于手势的动画效果。

skills.name: RESTful APIs
skills.description: 具备设计和使用 RESTful API 进行客户端与服务器通信的经验，理解 HTTP 方法、状态码，并熟悉使用 Swagger 等工具进行 API 文档编写。

skills.name: GraphQL (学习中...)
skills.description: 正在学习 GraphQL，熟悉其用于高效数据获取和 API 管理的应用，包括设置 Apollo 服务器，管理 schema，以及编写复杂的查询和变更。

skills.name: Jest
skills.description: 熟练使用 Jest 编写单元和集成测试，确保代码的可靠性，包括使用模拟库和设置持续集成管道进行自动化测试。

skills.name: Cypress (学习中)
skills.description: 正在学习 Cypress，熟悉编写全面的端到端测试用例，确保应用稳定性和良好的用户体验，使用插件扩展测试功能。

skills.name: Webpack (学习中)
skills.description: 正在学习 Webpack，掌握 JavaScript 模块打包和优化网页性能，了解使用 loader、插件，以及优化构建过程以提高加载速度。

skills.name: Performance Optimization
skills.description: 熟练进行网页性能优化，确保快速加载和流畅的用户体验，掌握 FCP、SI、LCP、TBT 和 CLS 等关键指标，熟悉使用 Google Lighthouse、WebPageTest 和 Chrome DevTools 等工具。

skills.name: Accessibility
skills.description: 有经验在开发过程中实现无障碍最佳实践，确保网页应用可供残障人士使用，熟悉屏幕阅读器测试、ARIA 角色和键盘导航等技术。

skills.name: SEO Optimization
skills.description: 熟练进行 SEO 优化，使用 Google Chrome 等工具评估和提升网站的可见性，优化标题、内容、元标签，并改善站点结构以提高索引效果。

skills.name: Figma
skills.description: 熟练使用 Figma 进行 UI/UX 设计，能与设计团队协作并将设计规格转化为代码，包括创建交互原型和设计系统。

skills.name: Adobe Photoshop (PS)
skills.description: 熟练使用 Adobe Photoshop 创建和编辑网页和 UI 项目所需的图形、图片和设计元素，具备照片编辑、合成和制作 Web 优化图形的经验。

skills.name: Component Libraries
skills.description: 有经验使用组件库构建响应式和移动优先的网页，熟悉常用组件库如 Flowbite UI、Material-UI、Ant Design 和 Bootstrap。

skills.name: Responsive Design
skills.description: 擅长创建响应式设计，确保网页应用在不同设备和屏幕尺寸下都能无缝运行，熟练使用媒体查询、灵活的网格布局和响应式图片等技术。

skills.name: Animation Libraries
skills.description: 精通多种动画库，如 Framer Motion、Animation.css 和 Spring，增强用户交互体验，创建复杂动画并确保性能优化。

skills.name: Testing Library
skills.description: 熟练使用 Testing Library 编写单元和集成测试，确保代码可靠性，能够使用模拟库和设置持续集成管道进行自动化测试。

Backend.description: As a continious web developer, I have been actively expanding my backend skills, especially in designing and implementing scalable and efficient server-side features. I’ve worked with modern backend technologies to support web applications, focusing on clean architecture, API integration, and database management. My hands-on experience in real-world projects—from frontend to backend—makes me a versatile developer who understands how different parts of a system work together. I’m committed to building high-quality, maintainable solutions that support business goals and user needs.

skills.name: NodeJS
skills.description: Skilled in NodeJS for building efficient and scalable server-side applications, including asynchronous programming with Promises and async/await, and using frameworks like Express.js and Koa.

skills.name: Python
skills.description: Proficient in Python for building RESTful APIs using frameworks like Flask and Django, with experience in designing API , handling authentication, performing data validation, and efficient database queries.

skills.name: .NET (Learning)
skills.description: Currently learning .NET to build cross-platform backend services, with a focus on C#, ASP.NET Core, and Entity Framework.

skills.name: JSON
skills.description: Adept at working with JSON for seamless data interchange between frontend and backend, including JSON schema validation and optimization for performance in API responses.

skills.name: Postman
skills.description: Skilled in using Postman for API testing and development, ensuring efficient and reliable API integrations, including creating and automating test collections and environments.

skills.name: Microservices
skills.description: Skilled in designing and implementing microservices architectures, including API gateway setup, service discovery, and inter-service communication using tools like Docker and Kubernetes.

skills.name: Serverless (Learning)
skills.description: Currently learning serverless architecture using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and related cloud services to create scalable and cost-efficient applications.

Backend.description: 作为一名持续的web开发人员，我一直在积极地扩展我的后端技能，特别是在设计和实现可扩展和高效的服务器端功能方面。我曾使用现代后端技术来支持web应用程序，专注于干净的架构、API集成和数据库管理。我在实际项目中的实践经验——从前端到后端——使我成为一名全能的开发人员，了解系统的不同部分如何协同工作。我致力于构建支持业务目标和用户需求的高质量、可维护的解决方案。

skills.name: NodeJS
skills.description: 擅长使用 NodeJS 构建高效且可扩展的服务器端应用程序，包括使用 Promises 和 async/await 进行异步编程，以及使用 Express.js 和 Koa 等框架。

skills.name: Python
skills.description: 擅长使用 Python 构建 RESTful API 接口。

skills.name: .NET（学习中）
skills.description: 目前正在学习 .NET，用于构建跨平台的后端服务，重点关注 C#、ASP.NET Core 和 Entity Framework。

skills.name: JSON
skills.description: 熟练使用 JSON 实现前后端数据交换，包括 JSON 模式验证和优化 API 响应性能。

skills.name: Postman
skills.description: 擅长使用 Postman 进行 API 测试和开发，包括创建和自动化测试集合与环境，确保 API 集成的高效与可靠。

skills.name: 微服务
skills.description: 擅长设计和实现微服务架构，包括设置 API 网关、服务发现，以及使用 Docker 和 Kubernetes 进行服务间通信。

skills.name: 无服务器（学习中）
skills.description: 目前正在学习无服务器架构，使用 AWS Lambda、API Gateway 和相关云服务，构建可扩展且具成本效益的应用程序。

DataBase.description: In the field of database management, I have accumulated valuable experience and have a solid understanding of various database technologies. I focus on ensuring efficient, reliable, and scalable database operations. Below are some of my capabilities in the database domain:

skills.name: MySQL
skills.description: Proficient in MySQL, capable of handling complex queries, index management, transaction processing, creating stored procedures and functions, and optimizing database performance through normalization and tuning.

skills.name: PostgreSQL
skills.description: Familiar with PostgreSQL, able to design robust and scalable database solutions, with knowledge of advanced features such as JSONB data types, full-text search, partitioning, and custom PL/pgSQL functions.

skills.name: Neo4j
skills.description: Experienced with Neo4j for graph database design, capable of structuring databases based on specific application needs, and performing data queries using Cypher.

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.description: Skilled in MongoDB for designing flexible NoSQL database solutions, creating indexes, and optimizing queries for better performance and scalability.

skills.name: Redis (Learning)
skills.description: Currently learning Redis, with an understanding of its use as an in-memory data structure store, used for caching, messaging, and database functions, including data persistence, replication, and high availability setup.

DataBase.description: 在数据库管理领域，我积累了丰富的经验，掌握了多种数据库技术，能够有效地进行数据库操作，确保数据库系统的可靠性和可扩展性。以下是我在数据库领域的一些能力：

skills.name: MySQL
skills.description: 熟悉 MySQL，能够进行复杂的查询、索引管理、事务处理，创建存储过程和函数，优化数据库性能，并熟悉数据库的规范化与调优。

skills.name: PostgreSQL
skills.description: 了解 PostgreSQL，能够构建稳健且可扩展的数据库解决方案，熟悉 JSONB 数据类型、全文搜索、分区和自定义 PL/pgSQL 函数等功能。

skills.name: Neo4j
skills.description: 有一定经验使用 Neo4j 进行图数据库设计，能够根据应用需求进行结构化设计，使用 Cypher 查询语言进行数据操作。

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.description: 熟悉 MongoDB，能够设计灵活的 NoSQL 数据库架构，创建索引并优化查询，确保数据库的扩展性和性能。

skills.name: Redis (学习中)
skills.description: 正在学习 Redis，了解它作为内存数据结构存储的应用，主要用于缓存、消息队列和数据库，熟悉数据持久化、复制和高可用性配置。

Other.description: The following are my abilities in other IT directions, such as version control, cloud, etc., which I will continue to learn:

skills.name: GitHub
skills.description: Proficient in version control with GitHub, using Git workflows for collaborative development, code reviews, and managing repositories. Experienced in continuous integration with GitHub Actions.

skills.name: AWS
skills.description: Experienced in deploying and managing scalable applications on AWS, using services like EC2, S3.

skills.name: Docker (Learning)
skills.description: Currently learning Docker for containerization, enabling streamlined deployment and scalability. Proficient in writing Dockerfiles and managing multi-container applications with Docker Compose.

skills.name: Jira
skills.description: Experienced with Jira for project management and issue tracking, facilitating Agile workflows, sprint planning, and team collaboration.

skills.name: Agile/Scrum
skills.description: Proficient in Agile and Scrum methodologies, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, and retrospectives for iterative software development.

skills.name: Jenkins (Learning)
skills.description: Learning Jenkins for continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD), automating software development workflows, including testing and deployment processes.

skills.name: Kubernetes (Learning)
skills.description: Currently learning Kubernetes for container orchestration, including managing and scaling applications in a clustered environment.

skills.name: Postman
skills.description: Proficient in Postman for API testing and development, automating test collections, and ensuring reliable API integrations.

Other.description: 以下是我其他 IT 方向的能力，如版本控制，云等，我会持续学习:

skills.name: GitHub
skills.description: 精通使用 GitHub 进行版本控制，熟悉 Git 工作流，用于协作开发、代码审查和管理代码库。具有使用 GitHub Actions 进行持续集成的经验。

skills.name: AWS
skills.description: 具有在 AWS 上部署和管理可扩展应用程序的经验，熟悉 EC2、S3 等服务的使用。

skills.name: Docker (学习中)
skills.description: 目前正在学习 Docker，用于容器化部署和可扩展性。精通编写 Dockerfile 和使用 Docker Compose 管理多容器应用程序。

skills.name: Jira
skills.description: 具有使用 Jira 进行项目管理和问题追踪的经验，能够促进敏捷工作流、冲刺计划和团队协作。

skills.name: 敏捷/Scrum
skills.description: 精通敏捷和 Scrum 方法论，包括冲刺计划、每日站会、冲刺回顾和回顾会议，用于迭代的软件开发流程。

skills.name: Jenkins (学习中)
skills.description: 正在学习 Jenkins 用于持续集成和交付（CI/CD），自动化软件开发工作流，包括测试和部署流程。

skills.name: Kubernetes (学习中)
skills.description: 目前正在学习 Kubernetes 用于容器编排，包括在集群环境中管理和扩展应用程序。

skills.name: Postman
skills.description: 精通使用 Postman 进行 API 测试和开发，能够自动化测试集合，确保 API 集成的可靠性。
